title: [Large-Scale] Assessment and Development of STEM Learning Design Competencies in Collaborative Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic STEM concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Utilizing collaborative online learning platforms in BYOD environments, providing real-time feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can create three or more learning activity scenarios by applying STEM instructional design principles (integration, inquiry, real-world connection).
Learners can improve their design proposals three or more times through knowledge sharing with peers in a collaborative online environment.
Learners can evaluate STEM learning activities designed using simulation/VR tools according to a peer assessment rubric.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
